Title: USPIS
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Brian Reich, Gabe Liedman (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (story editor), Matt O'Brien (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: While attempting to catch a drug dealer, Jake and Charles reluctantly join forces with the nerdy lead investigator at the U.S. Postal Service, Jack Danger. Meanwhile, the rest of the team helps Amy quit smoking.
